description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PWR Plugins Portfolio & Image Gallery for WordPress | PowerFolio allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Portfolio & Image Gallery for WordPress | PowerFolio: from n/a through 3.1.
